title: China deploys all available resources to tackle major Chikungunya outbreak
subhead: The cities of Foshan and Guangzhou, in southern China, have been battling the virus for two months. Nearly 10,000 cases have been officially recorded.

title: French researcher Laurent Vinatier now faces espionage charges in Moscow
subhead: The expert on the post-Soviet region has been held in Russia since June 2024. Sentenced to three years in a penal colony, he now faces up to 20 years in prison.

title: Deadly Israeli strikes on Khan Yunis's Nasser Hospital spark outrage all the way to the White House
subhead: More than 20 people died on Monday, among them medical staff and five journalists. Benjamin Netanyahu was forced to express his regrets, while the Israeli military cited collateral damage. Yet the use of a 'double strike,' a tactic repeatedly employed since the start of the war, undermines that argument.
